attributes.action: Provide fulsome scientific elucidation behind sun blocking
attributes.additional_details:
What thought has the government given to the following?
What will less Sun have on the nation’s physical and mental health? (eg vitamin D and rickets, depression, family cohesion).
How will this effects crop production in the UK and adjacent countries?
Has the UK consulted other countries?
Is the UK government prepared to pay reparation damages?
What are the names of all those proposing and implementing the idea?
attributes.background: Cooling a portion of atmosphere the size of the UK will draw an equivalent mass of southerly warmer air to the UK and conversely a mass of cooler air from the UK to warmer countries, as temperatures equalise. This creates the potential for an extreme weather event, typically hurricanes and flooding.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petition on the subject matter: 

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
